Row.Text: Admirals, navigators, sailors, and shipbuilders from around the world are gathering resources to create a Treasure Fleet, the largest and most prestigious fleet of ships ever made.
Receive one Frigate. 300 points towards next [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.
Receive a free Great Admiral and 3 of your military units will be maintenance-free.

Grand Canal wonder appears in [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital. (Receive 1 [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Additional[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Route. Grants all Naval Units except Submarines and Carriers the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Treasure Fleet[ENDCOLOR] Promotion, which grants +10% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength when attacking, +1 [ICON_VP_VISION] Sight, and the ability to heal [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Outside of Friendly Territory[ENDCOLOR].)
The militaries and military officers of the world's empires have assembled to highlight their fighting prowess and to make a claim to global preeminence.
Receive one Infantry and 3 of your military units will be maintenance-free.
Receive a +25% attack bonus to all Military Units for the next 30 turns and 4 of your military units will be maintenance-free.

Menin Gate wonder appears in [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital. (Receive +2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness in the City in which it is built. Receive 2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points whenever an owned unit is killed, scaling with Era. Forts, Citadels and Landmarks provide +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points when worked.)

A new era in global diplomacy and international relations has dawned. Delegates, officials and dignitaries from around the world have gathered to celebrate the construction of the United Nations, and with it the future of the human race.

Receive an immediate boost of 25 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with all City-States. The Consulate National Wonder appears in [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital. (Receive 1 [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Additional[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_DIPLOMAT] Delegate in the World Congress for every 8 [ICON_CITY_STATE] City-States originally in the World.)

United Nations wonder appears in [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital. (Receive 1 [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Additional[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_DIPLOMAT] Delegate in the World Congress for every 8 [ICON_CITY_STATE] City-States originally in the World. Also, when you expend a [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person, earn 25 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with all [ICON_CITY_STATE] City-States you have met. Triggers a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age, as well as the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]United Nations[ENDCOLOR] Special Session of the World Congress if the world has reached the Atomic Era.)
